languages.text: "Просто хотел{mf||а} сказать, что рад{mf||а} твоей компании. Особенно сейчас".
"I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."
languages.original_text: "Просто хотел{mf||а} сказать, что рад{mf||а} твоей компании. Особенно сейчас".

traits.locale_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."
"I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."
"I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."
"I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."

languages.text: 「お前がいてくれてよかったと伝えたかったのだ。特に、今のような時に」
languages.original_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がいてくれてよかったと伝えたかったのだ。特に、今のような時に」

languages.text: “我只想告诉你，这一路感谢有你的陪伴，尤其是此时此刻。”
languages.original_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."

traits.locale_text: “我只想告诉你，这一路感谢有你的陪伴，尤其是此时此刻。”

languages.text: "Ich wollte nur sagen, dass ich froh um Eure Gesellschaft bin. Besonders jetzt."
languages.original_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte nur sagen, dass ich froh um Eure Gesellschaft bin. Besonders jetzt."

languages.text: «Solo quería decir que agradezco la compañía. Especialmente ahora».
languages.original_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."

traits.locale_text: «Solo quería decir que agradezco la compañía. Especialmente ahora».

languages.text: « Sachez que je me réjouis de votre compagnie, surtout en ce moment. »
languages.original_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."

traits.locale_text: « Sachez que je me réjouis de votre compagnie, surtout en ce moment. »

languages.text: "Yanımda olmandan çok mutlu olduğumu söylemek istedim. Özellikle de şu anda."
languages.original_text: "I just wanted to say that I am glad of your company. Especially now."
